com.yantra.api.wms.inventory

Interface changeLocationInventoryAttributes

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    com.yantra.api.WMSApi, YIFApi

    public interface changeLocationInventoryAttributes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document changeLocationInventoryAttributes(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
      changeLocationInventoryAttributes changes the inventory attributes in the system for a location.

    • Method Detail

      • changeLocationInventoryAttributes

        org.w3c.dom.Document changeLocationInventoryAttributes(YFSEnvironment env,
                                                       org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
                                                throws com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException,
                                                       java.rmi.RemoteException

        changeLocationInventoryAttributes changes the inventory attributes in the system for a location.

        Related Documents
        Input XML Input DTD Error XML Error DTD

        User Exits:
        com.yantra.wms.japi.ue.WMSBeforeChangeAttributesUE
        com.yantra.wms.japi.ue.WMSCanChangeInventoryAttrsWithOpenTasksUE
        com.yantra.wms.japi.ue.WMSGetFifoNumberUE

        Events Raised:

        Events raised during transaction CHANGE_GLOBAL_SERIAL

          ON_CHANGE:
            When inventory attributes like ProductClass, InventoryStatus, ShipByDate etc. for serial inventory are changed this event is raised from warehouse inventory management for each serial.
            Data Published - INV_CHANGE_GLOBAL_SERIAL.ON_CHANGE.xml

        Audits:
        An Audit is performed in YFS_LOCN_INVENTORY_AUDIT for the quantity changed for the inventory. Inventory for which serial numbers are passed, audits are written for each serial number.

        Pre Conditions:
        A record must exist in database for the details given in input XML.

        Post Conditions:
        The quantity information in the YFS_INVENTORY_SUPPLY table is updated for items that are specified in the input XML file.

        Output Template Support: No

        Database Extensibility Support: Yes

        Configuration Required for Backward Compatibility: No

        Parameters:
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by the createEnvironment API.
        inXML - Required. For more information, see the associated input xml files.

        Returns:
        No Output XML.

        Throws:
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException - Exception containing error codes in the standard error files.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Java's default remote exception handler.
